page.title: 06Faldingworth School Sports
page.content: Every summer the{School Sports day is held. There are a variety of sports. Either on the morning or the day before the actual{sports}the field events are held. At 1.00pm. the children's parents start arriving and at 1.30pm. the racing begins. The infants races are all run before the junior races, but the juniors watch the infants run. Badges are awarded to the children who come first, second or third. There are four different teams, {Swallows, Eagles, Hawks and Swifts. Everybody runs at least two races. There are eight lanes, so two members of each team can run in each race. The older children have to run further than the younger children. Halfway through the{sports}an ice_cream van comes and the school buys every child an ice_cream or lolly.
